description: Standard Short-Stay Visa (Type C) for Tourism across the 29 Schengen member states. Optimized for Indian applicants.

meta.passport_validity: 3 months beyond intended departure from Schengen Area
meta.photo_spec: ICAO Standard (35x45mm, white background, 80% face coverage)

documents.title: Original Passport
documents.description: Must be valid for at least 3 months after exit. Issued within last 10 years. Two blank pages. Include copies of first and last page.

documents.title: Schengen Application Form
documents.description: Completed and signed Visa Application Form (Harmonized format).
documents.note: Some countries use digital portals (VIDEX, France-Visas).

documents.title: Two Passport Photos
documents.description: Recent (within 6 months), 35x45mm, matte finish, white background.

documents.title: Travel Medical Insurance
documents.description: Mandatory policy covering â‚¬30,000 min. for medical/repatriation. Must be valid in all Schengen states.

documents.title: Round Trip Flight Itinerary
documents.description: Confirmed reservation showing entry and exit from the Schengen zone. Do not buy tickets before approval.

documents.title: Proof of Accommodation
documents.description: Hotel vouchers or invitation letter from host covering the entire duration of stay.

documents.title: Proof of Sufficient Funds
documents.description: Bank statements for the last 3 months (stamped/signed), ITR-V (Last 3 years), and Salary Slips (3 months).

documents.title: Employment Proof / NOC
documents.description: Leave sanction letter (NOC) from employer, or business registration (GST/MSME) if self-employed.

documents.title: National ID (Aadhaar)
documents.description: Copy of Aadhaar Card (Front and Back). Often requested at VFS.

documents.title: Cover Letter
documents.description: Personal letter detailing the itinerary, purpose of visit, and intent to return.

steps_flow.title: Determine Jurisdiction
steps_flow.description: Identify the embassy of your main destination (longest stay or first entry).

steps_flow.title: Fill Application
steps_flow.description: Complete the country-specific application form (Online or PDF).

steps_flow.title: Book Appointment
steps_flow.description: Schedule a biometrics slot with the official service provider (VFS, TLS, or BLS).

steps_flow.title: Submit & Biometrics
steps_flow.description: Attend the center in person to submit documents and provide fingerprints.
